name: github-externship-assignment
description: You are given a String equation containing an equation of the form `A * B + C = D`, where A, B, C and D are positive integers that don't have leading zeros. \ One digit in the equation is missing. \ Determine and return the correct digit. \ If the missing digit cannot be determined (i.e., there is no solution or there is more than one solution), return `-1` instead.
